content.raw: Is the 18.04 host OS you’re working on an upgrade from 16.04 or did you fresh reinstall?  I’d say your best bet is a fresh install of 18.04 as native and this should work out of the box \(as it does with Docker\) although that’s going to slow down your immediate development it may be worth it to you as you want better performance outside of Docker.
content.html: Is the 18.04 host OS you’re working on an upgrade from 16.04 or did you fresh reinstall?
